verses.name: 1 Kings 6:21
verses.text: So Solomon overlaid the house within with pure gold: and he made a partition by the chains of gold before the oracle; and he overlaid it with gold.

verses.name: 1 Kings 6:22
verses.text: And the whole house he overlaid with gold, until he had finished all the house: also the whole altar that was by the oracle he overlaid with gold.

verses.name: 1 Kings 6:23
verses.text: And within the oracle he made two cherubims of olive tree, each ten cubits high.
